name: Weirdale
description:
LOST IN THE WONDERLAND

Weirdale is a horror game that transports the character to wonderland, a world where strange creatures live. You will have to find your way over the lake, through mountains, through a maze and through a forest filled with creatures to find offerings to open the portal that will send you back home. (VHS Graphic style)

MORE INFORMATIONS

Hello! 

This game was created in a month for Themed Horror Game Jam #5. If the game runs poorly on your computer, you can change the game's graphics settings in the "Settings" menu. The game is playable in QWERTY and AZERTY without having to change the keys, it's automatic.

Have fun :)

CREDITS

Game, 3D models and music: MisterBurgerDevelopment 

Software used: Unreal Engine 4, Blender, LMMS

Font : Public Pixel
